parameters.prompt: synthwave, nostalgic, melancholic, electric piano, dreamy, lo-fi, reverb, soft percussion
parameters.lyrics: [verse] The neon lights blur as the rain comes down, memories flicker like ghosts in this town, I trace the echoes of a voice I once knew, static whispers calling me back to you [chorus] We were electric in the dark, sparks in the night, leave a mark, now the tapes worn and the signals faint, but I still hear you in the hum of the rain [verse] Your name glows on a faded sign, a hologram love lost in time, the city hums but its not the same, just reruns playing our old refrain [chorus] We were electric in the dark, sparks in the night, leave a mark, now the tapes worn and the signals faint, but I still hear you in the hum of the rain [bridge] Rewind the years, press play on the past, the futures a frequency we couldnt hold fast [outro] The streets are empty, the screens all glow, singing our song on the late-night radio
